data.eml:eml: The genus Coleobonzia declared synonymous with Neobonzia Smiley, 1992 (Bdelloidea: Cunaxidae: Coleoscirinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Heyer, Jacob Den (2011): The genus Coleobonzia declared synonymous with Neobonzia Smiley, 1992 (Bdelloidea: Cunaxidae: Coleoscirinae). Zootaxa 2817: 59-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.203915
